title: 澳洲避風港政策港人意見研究

replies.msg:
幫幫手填下問卷同share，有關澳洲避風港政策港人意見研究

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc5HpKNlB3U6-UKikhYhvUpBhb7xeKOS-0KCFSL2JNx_uXW8g/viewform
-澳洲港人組織澳港聯原文-
[Survey on Hong Kongers’ Opinion regarding the Australian Safe Haven Scheme 澳洲避風港政策港人意見收集]
Survey Link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc5HpKNlB3U6-UKikhYhvUpBhb7xeKOS-0KCFSL2JNx_uXW8g/viewform
Please scroll below for English version
澳洲多個香港人組織現正合作進行網上意見調查，收集港人移民澳洲意向及對「澳洲香港人避風港政策」的意見，希望透過問卷調查了解港人移民澳洲面對的困難及阻礙，作深入分析。
各組織將會參考問卷調查所得的數據及分析結果，製訂報告及建議書，日後交予澳洲國會議員及政府相關部門參考，作遊說擴大目前香港人避風港政策的用途。
收集的資料及數據，只會用作分析及製訂報告用途，不會收集可識別個人身份的資料，亦不會對外公開，完成報告後，亦會完全刪除，不作保留。
此問卷調查分有10個分項，需時約5分鐘完成。
Along with several other Hong Kong organisations in Australia, we wish to gather information from Hongkongers, who are holding HKSAR and/or BNO passport(s), on their opinions regarding the Safe Haven Scheme and immigration intentions to Australia.
Information collected from this survey will be used solely for the purpose of informing the Australian government of the needs, concerns and characteristics of Hongkongers considering immigration to Australia. Analysed data will be presented in the form of a report and provided to the Australian government for their reference.
For the purpose of safety and confidentiality, this survey will not collect information that could potentially be used to identify participants. Data will not be publicly published, with the exception of its provision to Australian parliamentarians and government officials. After finalising the report, all data would be permanently and completely obliterated.
This survey contented 10 sections and will take around five minutes of your time. Your participation is important in ensuring that the scheme properly addresses Hongkongers' needs.
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc5HpKNlB3U6-UKikhYhvUpBhb7xeKOS-0KCFSL2JNx_uXW8g/viewform

澳洲維港
難聽都講一句，有需要避風港既港人，十有八九都入咗獄，避風港來得有點遲了
推，所有港人都可以參與架。

replies.msg: 幫得幾多得幾多啦，點知會唔會再有清算。澳洲暫時未開關，如果緊急可能要考慮下去共他地方先。
麻煩大家見到幫手推下share下，唔該晒
幫下手填下，有冇BNO，同澳洲冇關係都可以參與架，就係要所有香港人嘅意見
麻煩大家幫手推推，SHARE俾朋友
幫手推推，需要你哋嘅意見
無學歷又無錢既我去唔到 你地加油
